title: Fireside with the Underboss - "We'll Feed Him To Roy DeMeo"
description: Sammy gets approached by a man claiming to be the boss of the California family. He knows made members never introduce themselves. It isn't until Sammy gets a call from an angry Paul Castellano that he realizes something isn't right.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy gets approached by a man claiming to be the boss of the California family. He knows made members never introduce themselves. It isn't until Sammy gets a call from an angry Paul Castellano that he realizes something isn't right.
